33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Hudhaifah, that the Messenger of Allah(s.a.w) said:"It is not for the believer to humiliate himself." They said: "How does he humiliate himself?" He said: "By taking on a trial which he can not bear

chapter.eng-name: Not Taking On A Trial Which One Is Not Able To Bear
